SobreMim.descricao:
I am a Software Engineering student at PUC Minas, passionate about technology and driven by the constant challenge of learning and evolving in the development field.

Currently, I work as a Full-Stack Developer at 90 Tecnologia da Informação, a company specialized in solutions for civil engineering, where I put into practice my knowledge in developing systems that combine performance, usability, and innovation.

I have a strong interest in back-end development, for the opportunity to optimize processes, design solid architectures, and always seek the best performance in data processing. At the same time, I have experience in front-end development, which allows me to understand the entire software development lifecycle and deliver complete solutions.

In addition to technical skills, I highlight my proactivity, autonomy, and ability to learn quickly — traits that drive me to face new challenges and continuously grow, both academically and professionally.

data.descricao: Full-Stack Developer, working on system development and defining architectural solutions for projects.
